about_the_game:
Whether you’re grabbing a quick bite or settling in for a marathon of unpredictable mazes, Catch That Pizza! Maze Game always serves up a fresh challenge. Perfect for players of all ages, this delightful adventure sends you racing through hedge-lined paths, dodging slippery peels, and snatching fruit bowls for a speed boost—all before savoring delicious pizza!

                      

 

RANDOMIZED MAZES

Every maze is randomly generated, ensuring a new experience with each run. There are four levels of maze complexity. 

Play the game again and get a new maze:

CHASE THE MOVING PIZZA

Unlike ordinary maze games, your goal doesn’t sit still. The pizza vanishes and reappears in different spots, keeping you constantly on your toes. Don’t slip on banana peels, and make sure to grab fruit bowls to turbocharge your dash to victory.

                                              

 SELECT YOUR FAVORITE PIZZA

Cheese, pepperoni, or veggie—pick your favorite topping before starting the game. Each level may include multiple pizzas to catch before you can escape. Check your completion time after capturing the pizza(s) and exiting the maze, and see if you can outdo your best record!

 

IMMERSIVE HEDGE MAZE EXPERIENCE

Feel the outdoor ambience as you navigate a lush hedge maze. Hear the crunch of sand beneath your feet, take a breather on soft grass, and listen to the gentle wind rustling flags at the exit. Prepare to indulge in a unique, tasty, and endlessly surprising maze adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or Apple Silicon integrated GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Catch That Pizza! Maze Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Catch pizza as it magically teleports around a hedge maze, then race to the exit! Featuring relaxing Italian-themed music and fun sound effects.
